import React from 'react'; import { mdx } from '@mdx-js/react'; export const frontMatter = { title: ' Kubectl HPA', description: ' HPA Rancher UI 2.3.x Rancher UI HPA', keywords: [ 'rancher 2.0', 'rancher 2.x ', 'rancher', 'rancher 2.0', 'rancher2', 'rancher', 'rancher', 'rancher 2.0', 'rancher2.0 ', '', 'Pod ', ' Kubectl HPA' ] }; export const metadata = { "id": "rancher2/k8s-in-rancher/horitzontal-pod-autoscaler/testing-hpa/_index", "title": " Kubectl HPA", "description": " HPA Rancher UI 2.3.x Rancher UI HPA", "source": "@site/docs/rancher2/k8s-in-rancher/horitzontal-pod-autoscaler/testing-hpa/_index.md", "permalink": "/docs/rancher2/k8s-in-rancher/horitzontal-pod-autoscaler/testing-hpa/_index", "editUrl": "https://github.com/cnrancher/docs-rancher2/edit/master/docs/rancher2/k8s-in-rancher/horitzontal-pod-autoscaler/testing-hpa/_index.md", "lastUpdatedBy": "Author", "lastUpdatedAt": 1539502055, "sidebar": "rancher2", "previous": { "title": " Kubectl HPA", "permalink": "/docs/rancher2/k8s-in-rancher/horitzontal-pod-autoscaler/manage-hpa-with-kubectl/_index" }, "next": { "title": " HPA 2.0.7", "permalink": "/docs/rancher2/k8s-in-rancher/horitzontal-pod-autoscaler/hpa-for-rancher-before-2_0_7/_index" } }; /* @jsx mdx */ export const rightToc = [{ value: ' kubectl Kubernetes ', id: '-kubectl--kubernetes-', children: [] }, { value: ' hello-world ', id: '-hello-world-', children: [] }, { value: '', id: '', children: [] }, { value: ' HPA', id: '-hpa', children: [] }, { value: ' HPA ', id: '-hpa-', children: [] }, { value: ' HPA Pod ', id: '-hpa--pod-', children: [] }, { value: ' Pod ', id: '-pod-', children: [{ value: '', id: '', children: [] }, { value: '', id: '', children: [] }] }]; const makeShortcode = name => function MDXDefaultShortcode(props) { console.warn("Component " + name + " was not imported, exported, or provided by MDXProvider as global scope") return
}; const layoutProps = { rightToc }; const MDXLayout = "wrapper" export default function MDXContent({ components, ...props }) { return

{` HPA Rancher UI 2.3.x `}{` Rancher UI HPA`}{``}

{` HPA request hello-world HPA `}

{` `}{`kubectl`}{` Kubernetes `}

{` `}{`hello-world`}{` `}

{`apiVersion: apps/v1beta2
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hello-world
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: rancher/hello-world
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: hello-world
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 64Mi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
      restartPolicy: Always
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  ports:
  - port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    app: hello-world
`}

{``}

{`# kubectl create -f 
`}

{` HPA`}

  • {`Hello World HPA: `}

    {`apiVersion: autoscaling/v2beta1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
    kind: Deployment
    name: hello-world
  minReplicas: 1
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      targetAverageUtilization: 50
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: memory
      targetAverageValue: 1000Mi
`}

  • {`Hello World HPA: `}

    {`apiVersion: autoscaling/v2beta1
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
    kind: Deployment
    name: hello-world
  minReplicas: 1
  maxReplicas: 10
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      targetAverageUtilization: 50
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: memory
      targetAverageValue: 100Mi
  - type: Pods
    pods:
      metricName: cpu_system
      targetAverageValue: 20m
`}

{` HPA `}

  • {``}

    1. {``}

      {`# kubectl get hpa
NAME          REFERENCE                TARGETS                     MINPODS   MAXPODS   REPLICAS   AGE
hello-world   Deployment/hello-world   1253376 / 100Mi, 0% / 50%   1         10        1          6m
# kubectl describe hpa
Name:                                                  hello-world
Namespace:                                             default
Labels:                                                
Annotations:                                           
CreationTimestamp:                                     Mon, 23 Jul 2018 20:21:16 +0200
Reference:                                             Deployment/hello-world
Metrics:                                               ( current / target )
  resource memory on pods:                             1253376 / 100Mi
  resource cpu on pods  (as a percentage of request):  0% (0) / 50%
Min replicas:                                          1
Max replicas:                                          10
Conditions:
  Type            Status  Reason              Message
  ----            ------  ------              -------
  AbleToScale     True    ReadyForNewScale    the last scale time was sufficiently old as to warrant a new scale
  ScalingActive   True    ValidMetricFound    the HPA was able to successfully calculate a replica count from memory resource
  ScalingLimited  False   DesiredWithinRange  the desired count is within the acceptable range
Events:           
`}

  • {``}

    1. {``}

      {`# kubectl describe hpa
`}

    2. {``}

  ScalingActive   True    ValidMetricFound    the HPA was able to successfully calculate a replica count from memory resource
  ScalingLimited  False   DesiredWithinRange  the desired count is within the acceptable range
Events:           
`}

{` HPA Pod `}

{`HeyGatling `}{`Hey`}{``}

{` Pod `}

{``}

{` 2 PodCPU `}

{` CPU pod 2 `}

  1. {` HPA`}

    {`# kubectl describe hpa
`}

    {``}

    {`Name:                                                  hello-world
Namespace:                                             default
Labels:                                                
Annotations:                                           
CreationTimestamp:                                     Mon, 23 Jul 2018 22:22:04 +0200
Reference:                                             Deployment/hello-world
Metrics:                                               ( current / target )
  resource memory on pods:                             10928128 / 100Mi
  resource cpu on pods  (as a percentage of request):  56% (280m) / 50%
Min replicas:                                          1
Max replicas:                                          10
Conditions:
  Type            Status  Reason              Message
  ----            ------  ------              -------
  AbleToScale     True    SucceededRescale    the HPA controller was able to update the target scale to 2
  ScalingActive   True    ValidMetricFound    the HPA was able to successfully calculate a replica count from cpu resource utilization (percentage of request)
  ScalingLimited  False   DesiredWithinRange  the desired count is within the acceptable range
Events:
  Type    Reason             Age   From                       Message
  ----    ------             ----  ----                       -------
  Normal  SuccessfulRescale  13s   horizontal-pod-autoscaler  New size: 2; reason: cpu resource utilization (percentage of request) above target
`}

  2. {` 2 pod`}

`}

    {``}

hello-world-54764dfbf8-k8ph2                             1/1       Running   0          1m
hello-world-54764dfbf8-q6l4v                             1/1       Running   0          3h
`}
